name: Interactive Decision Arrows
description: Dynamic arrow components for showing decision flows and confidence levels with interactive animations
author: Hatch Team

parameters.name: arrows
parameters.description: Array of arrow configurations with text, confidence, and target

parameters.name: interactive
parameters.description: Enable interactive hover and click effects

usage.basic: Add decision flow arrows with confidence indicators
usage.advanced: Create complex decision trees with interactive elements

documentation: This component creates interactive arrow flows perfect for decision matrices, confidence assessments, and strategic direction slides.
